name: refinance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change the terms of a mortgage (= agreement by which you borrow money to buy property) or loan, usually by increasing the amount of it in order to be able to borrow more money: He got the money to buy more property by refinancing his original house. If you don't sell or refinance within 10 years, the principal comes due.
